data.title: Never disappoints
data.text: BBQ here is Yummy! Head there for great food and even better service! Go hungry and leave full. The brisket is a must!

data.title: Pretty good, not great BBQ at Rudy's!
data.text: My wife and I decided to try Rudy's BBQ in Goodyear AZ based on the recommendations of coworkers and Tripadvisor.  My wife and I like BBQ.  We have traveled to and dined at the BBQ epicenters' of North Carolina, Kansas City, and Memphis, while Rudy's is good, it is not spectacular. Meat is purchased by weight, unless you are purchasing a sandwich.  The beef brisket and pulled pork were very good, but the smoked turkey was excellent, by far the best meat available at Rudy's.  Rudy's only has 2 types of sauces, so... The potato salad was very good, but there was no cornbread or biscuits available, which is a mortal sin in my book.  The BBQ is good, but definitely not great.

data.title: Really good barbecue
data.text: My favorite is the moist brisket. The regular brisket is a little dry for my taste but everyone has different tastes. They have plenty of sides to compliment their excellent barbecue meats.

data.title: Bbq Bonanza
data.text: What a fun place to eat delicious bbq.  WE smelled the mouthwatering aroma aa we walked to the front door.  And the meat was even better than it smelled!  I hate the brisket sandwich and my friend had the pork sandwich.  The smoky goodness and tenderness of the meat are hard to beat.  You know it's good food when the average weight of the customer is over 250 pounds!  😁

data.title: Pretty Damn Good Q
data.text: Friday night BBQ at Rudy's.  We heard it was very good and they didn't disappoint.  I had the moist brisket and although the fat content made it slightly chewy, the flavor was good.  The side of Green Chile Stew was outstanding.  The wife had the baby backs and although a little small, they were lean and tasty.  The side of beans was just ok.  A sample of the turkey was very good as was the Spicy Chop pork.  I noticed they trimmed off the bark from the brisket - a mistake in my book.  The iced beer and soft drinks were a good touch.  Overall a great meal.

data.title: Love the setup and the food
data.text: Great family style atmosphere and quick lines to get the food ordered.  The food was nice and moist and everything tasted like it should.  Have been here several times and have always been more than satisfied with the food, the service and the set up.

data.title: Excellent, humble BBQ joint
data.text:
We stopped here since we were staying in Goodyear, AZ. What's more to say - really great BBQ! Everything is fresh, and there's a solid selection of meat and sides.

I suppose the only downside is that it can get a bit pricey if you're really hungry. But if you're in SW Phoenix / Goodyear / Estrella, it's worth a stop.

data.title: Good Food and Service
data.text: Good BBQ that comes fast and friendly. I eat here often and find it a mix in between fast food and restaurant. The food is always good, I especially enjoy the sausage and breakfast tacos! It can get a bit crowded for peak lunch hours but I suppose that's a good sign.

data.title: FINE BBQ, and they are proud of it!
data.text:
After doing some survey work in Buckeye, stopped off the freeway for a bite to eat while on my hour long drive home.
Grabbed a brisket sandwich, pound of ribs, and an orange soda to go.
Ate the brisket first...Fantastic. Tender, perfectly cooked, smoky and tangy with the house sauce. Some of the best I've had.
On down the road, gnawed on the ribs. Perfectly cooked, still on the bone, and lots of smoke flavor. Delicious. There's still a little left on my steering wheel.

data.title: Good
data.text: I have been to Rudy's in Texas three times. I was excited to try this one in AZ. Although it was good, I didn't think the brisket was as good as the Texas brisket. It was over smoked. The sweet tea wasn't as sweet as Texas. Maybe I am bias to Texas, but it was good and we enjoyed it.

data.title: Great BBQ
data.text: Great BBQ served in that down home feeling. They even have a covered porch so yo feel like your right at home. Back to the BBQ. The flavors are awesome and every sauce is great. The only knock is that portions can be a little low for the price. All in all Rudy's is great for lunch or dinner. Tip lunch time can be quite busy the service is fast just don't expect it to be quiet.

data.title: Breakfast at a BBQ restaurant!
data.text: Our first time to this restaurant. Breakfast tacos were generously filled with items of our choice! We had brisket, jalapeño sausage, potatoes, eggs, and cheese. We had 2 each and were stuffed! Yum!

data.title: Lovin' That Brisket!
data.text:
Definitely a fun (and lively) place to eat!  The prices are very reasonable and food was good, especially the brisket.  

We also tried the smoked prime rib and baby back ribs which were both pretty good.  The huge smoked baked potato with chopped brisket is a must try.  Other sides are also good.  Your food is ordered and picked up at the counter.

data.title: Brisket is Amazing!
data.text: This was our first visit to Rudy's.  I decided on the brisket, since that is one of my favorites.  It was very moist and juicy.  Prices are good, especially for the amount of food you get.  Very good first impression.  Next time we go, we are going to go for breakfast, since they have breakfast tacos, which we heard are really good too.

data.title: The Moist Brisket!!!!
data.text:
Great Food if you love BBQ / Grilled food.  Love the Moist Brisket, the banana pudding, the pulled pork, corn on the cob and beans.  I'm not a bean fan but I enjoy them hear with a large serving of moist brisket!

Can never go wrong here -

data.title: Must have ribs
data.text:
They give out samples to help you decide. I ended up ordering everything I sampled.
The ribs were very favorable and fall off of the bone deliciousness, the prime rib was tasty.

data.title: Brisket to go !
data.text:
We stop here frequently but this time was take out.  I grabbed a couple of pounds of brisket with some sides to go home and chill out on a Friday night. They percent people are friendly and fast. The BBQ is really good and it's easy on the wallet.  

They also have breakfast burritos pre made if you are in a hurry some morning.  

What are you waiting for???

data.title: GREAT PLACE!
data.text: We stopped for an early dinner before our long trip home. Since we had never been there before, we weren't sure what to expect. The restaurant is very clean and staff was very friendly and helpful. Its cafeteria style serving. The menu is on the wall and meat is ordered by the pound, side dishes are served in a container and all put into a basket you carry to the table. You set your table and clean up afterwards. All the serving containers and silverware are disposable. That food was awesome and some of the BEST we have had in a long time and the prices are great.  Cream corn is very good.  We will definitely stop again!

data.title: Great for catering your event!
data.text:
Had Rudy's cater offsite department meeting for 50. The food was delivered on time, was piping hot and everything was delicious!

They are very helpful with making arrangements and helping determine quantities. We had just enough leftovers but not too much. 

My team loved their lunch and I loved how easy it was to arrange, a true win-win!

data.title: Texas-style BBQ
data.text: We visited as an extended family. The restaurant is popular with locals, always a good sign! The food was good, we had a nice meal.
